author: stas
msg: 2.0.43 is doing well, so reduce the skip of subtests to 2.0.42

author: stas
msg: this is not needed in newer Apache versions, however older versions
(2.0.40) will repeatedly call this filter, waiting for EOS which will
never come from this filter so, after several invocations mark the
seen_eos flag, to break the vicious cirle

author: stas
msg: $filter->seen_eos() now accepts 1/0 to set/unset the flag so streaming
filters can control the sending of EOS.

author: stas
msg: pre-2.0.44 seem to have a different behavior regarding sending the
response code after the script has sent some body following by an error
(because it used to buffer the output)

author: stas
msg: insert eos bucket when ignoring eos buckets on read
